attributes.source:
---
title: Restaurants Routes
---

# {% $markdoc.frontmatter.title %}

## Getting restaurants

### /restaurants

this gets you a list of all the restaurants that are stored, each verified

#### get

```shell
[{
    RestaurantName:String,

    menu:String,
    
    category:[String],
    
    contact:String,
    
    delivers:Boolean,
    
    rating:{},
    
    aveRating:Number,
      
    numberOfVoters:Number,
}]
```


### /restaurants/chooseRes

#### get

same as above however it will choose randomly

### /restaurants/:id

#### get

same as above however it will be assosiated with a specific id, useful for show more information about a certain restaurant


## Creating restaurants

### /restaurants

#### post

this one is a bit more tricky, the only fields you need to provide are the first five, RestaurantName, menu, category, contact, delivers, there are others that are optional but they are maintained internally, however this will only get executed once it goes through our pull request system same goes with the put and delete, this route also requires authentications

```shell
{
    RestaurantName:String,

    menu:String,
    
    category:[String],
    
    contact:String,
    
    delivers:Boolean,
}
```

## updating and deleting restaurants 

### /restaurants

#### put

#### delete

both of these routes use our pull request system, and it also requires authentications 

```shell
{
    RestaurantName:String,

    menu:String,
    
    category:[String],
    
    contact:String,
    
    delivers:Boolean,
}
```

## Voting for restaurants

### /restaurants/vote/:id

#### post

this is for voting for a restaurant that you like the numbers you can choose from are 1-5 with 5 being the most likable and 1 to the most dislikable

```shell
{
    rating:Number
}
```

#### delete

for this route you should send an empty body, as it will just remove your name from the voting.

## Restaurants Schema

```shell
{
    RestaurantName:String,

    menu:String,
    
    category:[String],
    
    contact:String,
    
    delivers:Boolean,
    
    rating:{},
    
    aveRating:Number,
      
    numberOfVoters:Number,

    createdAt:string

    updatedAt:string
}
```

## Next steps

- [Pull Requests](/docs/pull-requests)
- [See Common Questions](/docs/faq)
